html:
2025-0929
2025-12-11IRCCCitizenship ActRegulations Amending the Citizenship Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)Regulations Amending the Citizenship Regulations (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) update a reference to specific subsections of the Citizenship Regulations No.2; (2) correct a discrepancy between English and French versions; and (3) clarify that applications to renounce citizenship can be made by minors.Registration: SOR/2025-0276 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Regulations Amending the Citizenship Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the Citizenship Regulations (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) update a reference to specific subsections of the Citizenship Regulations No.2; (2) correct a discrepancy between English and French versions; and (3) clarify that applications to renounce citizenship can be made by minors.
